channel.title: Can't log in
channel.description:
alrighty then, so I have downloaded a ton of sources/clients and edited and done everything in tutorials and stuff, except for portforwarding and np-ip.com. I have an acc for no-ip, but i don't understand what to do with it, and I want to know why the hell i am supposed to open my ports on router? can't i just log in local? I've tried logging in and it just says error connecting to server. So i have deleted all my RSPS files, and am starting over. ---I would like it if somebody could give me a link for a good source/client download that I can work with. ---and explain to me what the hell i need to do with portforwarding(why), and what no-ip is for. ---also, am i able to just log into the client on my computer without it online? just local?
thanks alot guys :P

item.title: Can't log in
item.dc:creator: @brendan.brusse brendan.brusse
item.description:
@brendan.brusse wrote:

alrighty then, so I have downloaded a ton of sources/clients and edited and done everything in tutorials and stuff, except for portforwarding and np-ip.com.
I have an acc for no-ip, but i don’t understand what to do with it, and I want to know why the hell i am supposed to open my ports on router? can’t i just log in local? I’ve tried logging in and it just says error connecting to server.
So i have deleted all my RSPS files, and am starting over.
—I would like it if somebody could give me a link for a good source/client download that I can work with.
—and explain to me what the hell i need to do with portforwarding(why), and what no-ip is for.
—also, am i able to just log into the client on my computer without it online? just local?

thanks alot guys
